00060 void MsqMeshEntity::get_vertex_indices(std::vector<std::size_t> &vertices) const
00061 {
00062   vertices.resize( vertex_count() );
00063   std::copy( vertexIndices, vertexIndices + vertex_count(), vertices.begin() );
00064 }
00065 
00073 void MsqMeshEntity::append_vertex_indices(std::vector<std::size_t> &vertex_list) const
00074 {
00075   vertex_list.insert(vertex_list.end(),
00076                      vertexIndices,
00077                      vertexIndices + vertex_count());
00078 }

00080 void MsqMeshEntity::get_node_indices( std::vector<std::size_t>& indices ) const
00081 {
00082   indices.resize( node_count() );
00083   std::copy( vertexIndices, vertexIndices + node_count(), indices.begin() );
00084 }
00085 
00086 void MsqMeshEntity::append_node_indices( std::vector<std::size_t>& indices ) const
00087 {
00088   indices.insert( indices.end(), vertexIndices, vertexIndices + node_count() );
00089 }

00096 void MsqMeshEntity::get_centroid(Vector3D &centroid, const PatchData &pd, MsqError &err) const
00097 {
00098   centroid = 0.0;
00099   const MsqVertex* vtces = pd.get_vertex_array(err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00100   size_t nve = vertex_count();
00101   for (size_t i=0; i<nve; ++i)
00102     centroid += vtces[vertexIndices[i]];
00103   centroid /= nve;
00104 }
00105   
00106 
00107 static inline double corner_volume( const Vector3D& v0,
00108                                     const Vector3D& v1,
00109                                     const Vector3D& v2,
00110                                     const Vector3D& v3 )
00111 {
00112   return (v1 - v0) * (v2 - v0) % (v3 - v0);
00113 }
00114 
00119 double MsqMeshEntity::compute_unsigned_area(PatchData &pd, MsqError &err) {
00120   const MsqVertex* verts=pd.get_vertex_array(err);MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00121   double tem=0.0;
00122   switch (mType)
00123   {
00124    
00125     case TRIANGLE:
00126       tem =  ((verts[vertexIndices[1]]-verts[vertexIndices[0]])*
00127               (verts[vertexIndices[2]]-verts[vertexIndices[0]])).length();
00128       return 0.5*tem;
00129       
00130     case QUADRILATERAL:
00131       tem = ((verts[vertexIndices[1]]-verts[vertexIndices[0]])*
00132              (verts[vertexIndices[3]]-verts[vertexIndices[0]])).length();
00133       tem += ((verts[vertexIndices[3]]-verts[vertexIndices[2]])*
00134               (verts[vertexIndices[1]]-verts[vertexIndices[2]])).length();
00135       return (tem/2.0);
00136     
00137     case POLYGON: 
00138         // assume convex
00139       for (unsigned i = 1; i < numVertexIndices-1; ++i)
00140         tem += ((verts[vertexIndices[i]] - verts[vertexIndices[0]]) *
00141                 (verts[vertexIndices[i+1]] - verts[vertexIndices[0]])).length();
00142       return 0.5 * tem;
00143     
00144     case TETRAHEDRON:
00145       return 1.0/6.0 * fabs( corner_volume( verts[vertexIndices[0]],
00146                                             verts[vertexIndices[1]],
00147                                             verts[vertexIndices[2]],
00148                                             verts[vertexIndices[3]] ) );
00149     
00150     case PYRAMID: {
00151       Vector3D m = verts[vertexIndices[0]] + verts[vertexIndices[1]] 
00152                  + verts[vertexIndices[2]] + verts[vertexIndices[3]];
00153       Vector3D t1 = verts[vertexIndices[0]] - verts[vertexIndices[2]];
00154       Vector3D t2 = verts[vertexIndices[1]] - verts[vertexIndices[3]];
00155       tem = ((t1 + t2) * (t1 - t2)) % (verts[vertexIndices[4]] - 0.25 * m);
00156       return (1.0/12.0) * fabs(tem);
00157     }
00158     
00159     case PRISM: {
00160       tem  = corner_volume( verts[vertexIndices[0]],
00161                             verts[vertexIndices[1]],
00162                             verts[vertexIndices[2]],
00163                             verts[vertexIndices[3]] );
00164 
00165       tem += corner_volume( verts[vertexIndices[1]],
00166                             verts[vertexIndices[2]],
00167                             verts[vertexIndices[3]],
00168                             verts[vertexIndices[4]] );
00169 
00170       tem += corner_volume( verts[vertexIndices[2]],
00171                             verts[vertexIndices[3]],
00172                             verts[vertexIndices[4]],
00173                             verts[vertexIndices[5]] );
00174                         
00175       return 1.0/6.0 * fabs(tem);
00176     }
00177     
00178     case HEXAHEDRON: {
00179     
00180       tem  = corner_volume( verts[vertexIndices[1]],
00181                             verts[vertexIndices[2]],
00182                             verts[vertexIndices[0]],
00183                             verts[vertexIndices[5]] );
00184                             
00185       tem += corner_volume( verts[vertexIndices[3]],
00186                             verts[vertexIndices[0]],
00187                             verts[vertexIndices[2]],
00188                             verts[vertexIndices[7]] );
00189                             
00190       tem += corner_volume( verts[vertexIndices[4]],
00191                             verts[vertexIndices[7]],
00192                             verts[vertexIndices[5]],
00193                             verts[vertexIndices[0]] );
00194                             
00195       tem += corner_volume( verts[vertexIndices[6]],
00196                             verts[vertexIndices[5]],
00197                             verts[vertexIndices[7]],
00198                             verts[vertexIndices[2]] );
00199                             
00200       tem += corner_volume( verts[vertexIndices[5]],
00201                             verts[vertexIndices[2]],
00202                             verts[vertexIndices[0]],
00203                             verts[vertexIndices[7]] );
00204 
00205       return (1.0/6.0) * fabs(tem);
00206     }
00207     
00208     default:
00209       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid type of element passed to compute unsigned area.",
00210                       MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00211       return 0;
00212   }
00213   return 0;
00214 }
00215                                             
00220 double MsqMeshEntity::compute_signed_area(PatchData &pd, MsqError &err) {
00221   const MsqVertex* verts=pd.get_vertex_array(err);MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00222   double tem=0.0;
00223   double tem2=0.0;
00224   Vector3D surface_normal;
00225   Vector3D cross_vec;
00226   size_t element_index=pd.get_element_index(this);
00227   
00228   switch (mType)
00229   {
00230     
00231     case TRIANGLE:
00232       cross_vec=((verts[vertexIndices[1]]-verts[vertexIndices[0]])*
00233       (verts[vertexIndices[2]]-verts[vertexIndices[0]]));
00234       pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(element_index,surface_normal,err);
00235       MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00236       tem =  (cross_vec.length()/2.0);
00237         //if normals do not point in same general direction, negate area
00238       if(cross_vec%surface_normal<0){ 
00239         tem *= -1;
00240       }
00241       
00242       return tem;
00243       
00244     case QUADRILATERAL:
00245       cross_vec=((verts[vertexIndices[1]]-verts[vertexIndices[0]])*
00246                  (verts[vertexIndices[3]]-verts[vertexIndices[0]]));
00247       pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(element_index,surface_normal,err);
00248       MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00249       tem =  (cross_vec.length()/2.0);
00250         //if normals do not point in same general direction, negate area
00251       if(cross_vec%surface_normal<0){ 
00252         tem *= -1;
00253       }
00254       cross_vec=((verts[vertexIndices[3]]-verts[vertexIndices[2]])*
00255                  (verts[vertexIndices[1]]-verts[vertexIndices[2]]));
00256       tem2 =  (cross_vec.length()/2.0);
00257         //if normals do not point in same general direction, negate area
00258       if(cross_vec%surface_normal<0){ 
00259         tem2 *= -1;
00260           //test to make sure surface normal existed
00261           //if(surface_normal.length_squared()<.5){
00262           //err.set_msg("compute_signed_area called without surface_normal available.");
00263           //}  
00264       }
00265       return (tem + tem2);
00266       
00267     default:
00268       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid type of element passed to compute unsigned area.",
00269                        MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00270       return 0;
00271   };
00272   return 0.0;
00273 }
00274     
00281 void MsqMeshEntity::get_connected_vertices( 
00282                                     std::size_t vertex_index,
00283                                     std::vector<std::size_t> &vert_indices,
00284                                     MsqError &err)
00285 {
00286     //index is set to the index in the vertexIndices corresponding
00287     //to vertex_index
00288   int index;
00289   for (index = vertex_count() - 1; index >= 0; --index)
00290     if (vertexIndices[index] == vertex_index)
00291       break;
00292   if (index < 0)
00293   {
00294     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid vertex index.", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00295     return;
00296   }
00297   
00298   unsigned n;
00299   const unsigned* indices = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( mType, index, n );
00300   if (!indices)
00301     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Element type not available", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00302   for (unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00303     vert_indices.push_back( vertexIndices[indices[i]] );
00304 }

00309 /*
00310 void MsqMeshEntity::compute_corner_normal(size_t corner,
00311                                           Vector3D &normal,
00312                                           PatchData &pd, 
00313                                           MsqError &err)
00314 {
00315   if ( get_element_type()==TRIANGLE || get_element_type()==QUADRILATERAL ) 
00316   {
00317       // There are two cases where we cannot get a normal from the 
00318       // geometry that are not errors:
00319       // 1) There is no domain set
00320       // 2) The vertex is at a degenerate point on the geometry (e.g. 
00321       //     tip of a cone.)
00322     
00323     bool have_normal = false;
00324 
00325       // Get normal from domain
00326     if (pd.domain_set()) 
00327     {
00328       size_t index = pd.get_element_index(this);
00329       pd.get_domain_normal_at_corner( index, corner, normal, err );
00330       MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00331       
00332       double length = normal.length();
00333       if (length > DBL_EPSILON) 
00334       {
00335         have_normal = true;
00336         normal /= length;
00337       }
00338     }
00339 
00340       // If failed to get normal from domain, calculate
00341       // from adjacent vertices.
00342     if ( !have_normal )
00343     {
00344       const int num_corner = this->vertex_count();
00345       const int prev_corner = (corner + num_corner - 1) % num_corner;
00346       const int next_corner = (corner + 1 ) % num_corner;
00347       const size_t this_idx = vertexIndices[corner];
00348       const size_t prev_idx = vertexIndices[prev_corner];
00349       const size_t next_idx = vertexIndices[next_corner];
00350       normal = (pd.vertex_by_index(next_idx) - pd.vertex_by_index(this_idx))
00351              * (pd.vertex_by_index(prev_idx) - pd.vertex_by_index(this_idx));
00352       normal.normalize();
00353     }
00354   }
00355   else
00356     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Should only be used for faces (tri, quads, ...).",
00357                     MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00358 }
00359 */
00360 
00361 void MsqMeshEntity::compute_corner_normals( Vector3D normals[],
00362                                             PatchData &pd, 
00363                                             MsqError &err)
00364 {
00365   EntityTopology type = get_element_type();
00366   if (type != TRIANGLE && type != QUADRILATERAL && type != POLYGON)
00367   {
00368       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Should only be used for faces (tri, quads, ...).",
00369                     MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00370       return;
00371   }
00372   
00373   
00374     // There are two cases where we cannot get a normal from the 
00375     // geometry that are not errors:
00376     // 1) There is no domain set
00377     // 2) The vertex is at a degenerate point on the geometry (e.g. 
00378     //     tip of a cone.)
00379 
00380     // Get normal from domain
00381   if (pd.domain_set()) 
00382   {
00383     size_t index = pd.get_element_index(this);
00384     pd.get_domain_normals_at_corners( index, normals, err );
00385     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00386   }
00387 
00388     // Check if normals are valid (none are valid if !pd.domain_set())
00389   const unsigned count = vertex_count();
00390   for (unsigned i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00391   {
00392       // If got valid normal from domain, 
00393       // make it a unit vector and continue.
00394     if (pd.domain_set()) 
00395     {
00396       double length = normals[i].length();
00397       if (length > DBL_EPSILON)
00398       {
00399         normals[i] /= length;
00400         continue;
00401       }
00402     }
00403     
00404     const size_t prev_idx = vertexIndices[(i + count - 1) % count];
00405     const size_t this_idx = vertexIndices[i];
00406     const size_t next_idx = vertexIndices[(i + 1) % count];
00407 
00408       // Calculate normal using edges adjacent to corner
00409     normals[i] = (pd.vertex_by_index(next_idx) - pd.vertex_by_index(this_idx))
00410                * (pd.vertex_by_index(prev_idx) - pd.vertex_by_index(this_idx));
00411     normals[i].normalize();
00412   }
00413 }
00414 
00415 ostream& operator<<( ostream& stream, const MsqMeshEntity& entity )
00416 {
00417   size_t num_vert = entity.vertex_count();
00418   stream << "MsqMeshEntity " << &entity << " with vertices ";
00419   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_vert; ++i)
00420     stream << entity.vertexIndices[i] << " ";
00421   stream << endl;
00422   return stream;
00423 }

00427 
00433 size_t MsqMeshEntity::get_local_matrix_map_about_vertex(
00434   PatchData &pd, MsqVertex* vert, size_t local_map_size,
00435   int* local_map, MsqError &err) const
00436 {
00437     //i iterates through elem's vertices
00438   int i=0;
00439     //index is set to the index in the vertexIndices corresponding
00440     //to vertex_index
00441   int index=-1;
00442   int return_val=0;
00443   const MsqVertex* vertex_array = pd.get_vertex_array(err);
00444   if(err)
00445     return return_val;
00446   
00447   switch (mType)
00448   {
00449     case TRIANGLE:
00450       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Requested function not yet supported for Triangles.",
00451                       MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
00452       
00453       break;
00454       
00455     case QUADRILATERAL:
00456       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Requested function not yet supported for Quadrilaterals.",
00457                       MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
00458        
00459       break;
00460       
00461     case TETRAHEDRON:
00462       if(local_map_size<4){
00463         MSQ_SETERR(err)("Array of incorrect length sent to function.",
00464                         MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00465         return return_val;
00466       }
00467       return_val = 4;
00468       while(i<4)
00469       {
00470         if(&vertex_array[vertexIndices[i]]==vert)
00471         {
00472           index=i;
00473           break;
00474         }
00475         ++i;
00476       }
00477       switch(index){
00478         case(0):
00479           local_map[0]=0;
00480           local_map[1]=1;
00481           local_map[2]=2;
00482           local_map[3]=3;
00483           break;
00484         case(1):
00485           local_map[0]=1;
00486           local_map[1]=0;
00487           local_map[2]=3;
00488           local_map[3]=2;
00489           break;
00490         case(2):
00491           local_map[0]=2;
00492           local_map[1]=3;
00493           local_map[2]=0;
00494           local_map[3]=1;
00495           break;
00496         case(3):
00497           local_map[0]=3;
00498           local_map[1]=2;
00499           local_map[2]=1;
00500           local_map[3]=0;
00501           break;
00502         default:
00503           local_map[0]=-1;
00504           local_map[1]=-1;
00505           local_map[2]=-1;
00506           local_map[3]=-1;
00507       };
00508       
00509       break;
00510       
00511     case HEXAHEDRON:
00512       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Requested function not yet supported for Hexahedrons.",
00513                       MsqError::NOT_IMPLEMENTED);
00514       
00515       break;
00516     default:
00517       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Element type not available", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00518       break;
00519   }
00520   return return_val;
00521   
00522 }
00523 
00524 
00525 void MsqMeshEntity::check_element_orientation(
00526   PatchData &pd, int& inverted, int& total, MsqError &err)
00527 {
00528   NodeSet all = all_nodes( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00529   unsigned i;
00530 
00531   if (TopologyInfo::dimension(mType) == 2) {
00532     if (!pd.domain_set()) {
00533       total = 0;
00534       inverted = 0;
00535       return;
00536     }
00537   
00538     const MappingFunction2D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_2D( mType );
00539     if (!mf) {
00540       check_element_orientation_corners( pd, inverted, total, err );
00541       return;
00542     }
00543    
00544     NodeSet sample = mf->sample_points( all );
00545     total = sample.num_nodes();
00546     inverted = 0;
00547     
00548     if (sample.have_any_corner_node()) {
00549       for (i = 0; i < TopologyInfo::corners(mType); ++i)
00550         if (sample.corner_node(i)) 
00551           inverted += inverted_jacobian_2d( pd, all, Sample(0,i), err );
00552     }
00553     if (sample.have_any_mid_edge_node()) {
00554       for (i = 0; i < TopologyInfo::edges(mType); ++i)
00555         if (sample.mid_edge_node(i))
00556           inverted += inverted_jacobian_2d( pd, all, Sample(1,i), err );
00557     } 
00558     if (sample.have_any_mid_face_node())
00559       inverted += inverted_jacobian_2d( pd, all, Sample(2,0), err );
00560   }
00561   else {
00562     const MappingFunction3D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( mType );
00563     if (!mf) {
00564       check_element_orientation_corners( pd, inverted, total, err );
00565       return;
00566     }
00567     
00568     NodeSet sample = mf->sample_points( all );
00569     total = sample.num_nodes();
00570     inverted = 0;
00571     
00572     if (sample.have_any_corner_node()) {
00573       for (i = 0; i < TopologyInfo::corners(mType); ++i)
00574         if (sample.corner_node(i))
00575           inverted += inverted_jacobian_3d( pd, all, Sample(0,i), err );
00576     }
00577     if (sample.have_any_mid_edge_node()) {
00578       for (i = 0; i < TopologyInfo::edges(mType); ++i)
00579         if (sample.mid_edge_node(i))
00580           inverted += inverted_jacobian_3d( pd, all, Sample(1,i), err );
00581     } 
00582     if (sample.have_any_mid_face_node()) {
00583       for (i = 0; i < TopologyInfo::faces(mType); ++i)
00584         if (sample.mid_face_node(i))
00585           inverted += inverted_jacobian_3d( pd, all, Sample(2,i), err );
00586     } 
00587     if (sample.have_any_mid_region_node()) {
00588       inverted += inverted_jacobian_3d( pd, all, Sample(3,0), err );
00589     }
00590   }
00591 }
00592 
00593 bool
00594 MsqMeshEntity::inverted_jacobian_3d( PatchData& pd, NodeSet nodes, Sample sample, MsqError& err )
00595 {
00596   MsqMatrix<3,3> J;
00597   MsqVector<3> junk[27];
00598   size_t junk2[27], junk3;
00599   assert(node_count() <= 27);
00600 
00601   const MappingFunction3D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( mType );
00602   mf->jacobian( pd, pd.get_element_index(this), nodes, 
00603                 sample, junk2, junk, junk3, J, err );
00604   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00605   //const double size_eps_sqr = sqr_Frobenius( J ) * DBL_EPSILON;
00606   const double d = det(J);
00607   double l1 = J.column(0) % J.column(0);
00608   double l2 = J.column(1) % J.column(1);
00609   double l3 = J.column(2) % J.column(2);
00610   return d < 0 || d*d < DBL_EPSILON*DBL_EPSILON * l1*l2*l3;
00611 }
00612 
00613 bool 
00614 MsqMeshEntity::inverted_jacobian_2d( PatchData& pd, NodeSet nodes, Sample sample, MsqError& err )
00615 {
00616   MsqMatrix<3,2> J;
00617   MsqVector<2> junk[9];
00618   size_t junk2[9], junk3;
00619   assert(node_count() <= 9);
00620 
00621   const int idx = pd.get_element_index(this);
00622   const MappingFunction2D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_2D( mType );
00623   mf->jacobian( pd, idx, nodes, sample, junk2, junk, junk3, J, err );
00624   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00625   const MsqVector<3> cross = J.column(0) * J.column(1);
00626 
00627   if (pd.domain_set()) {
00628     Vector3D norm;
00629     pd.get_domain_normal_at_sample( pd.get_element_index(this), sample, norm, err );
00630     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00631   
00632     const MsqVector<3> N(&norm[0]);
00633     if (cross % N < 0.0)
00634       return true;
00635   }
00636   
00637   const double l1 = J.column(0) % J.column(0);
00638   const double l2 = J.column(1) % J.column(1);
00639   return cross % cross < DBL_EPSILON*DBL_EPSILON * l1*l2;
00640 }
00641 
00642 NodeSet
00643 MsqMeshEntity::all_nodes( MsqError& err ) const
00644 {
00645   bool mid_edge, mid_face, mid_vol;
00646   TopologyInfo::higher_order( mType, node_count(), mid_edge, mid_face, mid_vol, err );
00647   NodeSet result;
00648   result.set_all_corner_nodes( mType );
00649   if (mid_edge)
00650     result.set_all_mid_edge_nodes( mType );
00651   if (mid_face)
00652     result.set_all_mid_face_nodes( mType );
00653   if (mid_vol)
00654     result.set_all_mid_region_nodes( mType );
00655   return result;
00656 }
00657 
00658 void MsqMeshEntity::check_element_orientation_corners(
00659   PatchData &pd, 
00660   int& inverted,
00661   int& total,
00662   MsqError &err)
00663 {
00664   int num_nodes = node_count();
00665   total = inverted = 0;
00666 
00667   if (node_count() > vertex_count()) {
00668     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Cannot perform inversion test for higher-order element"
00669                     " without mapping function.", MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00670     return;
00671   }
00672 
00673   const MsqVertex *vertices = pd.get_vertex_array(err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00674 
00675   const Vector3D d_con(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00676 
00677   int i;
00678   Vector3D coord_vectors[3];
00679   Vector3D center_vector;
00680   
00681   switch(mType) {
00682     case TRIANGLE:
00683       
00684       if (!pd.domain_set())
00685         return;
00686       
00687       pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(this, coord_vectors[2], err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00688       coord_vectors[2] = coord_vectors[2] / coord_vectors[2].length();// Need unit normal
00689       center_vector = vertices[vertexIndices[0]];
00690       coord_vectors[0] = vertices[vertexIndices[1]]-center_vector;
00691       coord_vectors[1] = vertices[vertexIndices[2]]-center_vector;
00692       total = 1;
00693       inverted = (coord_vectors[2]%(coord_vectors[0]*coord_vectors[1] ) <= 0.0);
00694       break;
00695     
00696     case QUADRILATERAL:
00697       
00698       if (!pd.domain_set())
00699         return;
00700 
00701       pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(this, coord_vectors[2], err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00702       coord_vectors[2] = coord_vectors[2] / coord_vectors[2].length();// Need unit normal
00703 
00704       for (i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00705         center_vector = vertices[vertexIndices[i]];
00706         coord_vectors[0] = vertices[vertexIndices[(i+1)%4]]-center_vector;
00707         coord_vectors[1] = vertices[vertexIndices[(i+3)%4]]-center_vector;
00708         ++total;
00709         inverted += (coord_vectors[2]%(coord_vectors[0]*coord_vectors[1] ) <= 0.0);
00710       }
00711       break;
00712 
00713     case TETRAHEDRON:
00714       center_vector = vertices[vertexIndices[0]];
00715       coord_vectors[0] = vertices[vertexIndices[1]]-center_vector;
00716       coord_vectors[1] = vertices[vertexIndices[2]]-center_vector;
00717       coord_vectors[2] = vertices[vertexIndices[3]]-center_vector;
00718       total = 1;
00719       inverted = ( coord_vectors[0]%(coord_vectors[1]*coord_vectors[2] ) <= 0.0);
00720       break;
00721 
00722     case POLYGON:
00723       
00724       if (!pd.domain_set())
00725         return;
00726 
00727       pd.get_domain_normal_at_element(this, coord_vectors[2], err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00728       coord_vectors[2] = coord_vectors[2] / coord_vectors[2].length();// Need unit normal
00729 
00730       for (i = 0; i < num_nodes; ++i) {
00731         center_vector = vertices[vertexIndices[i]];
00732         coord_vectors[0] = vertices[vertexIndices[(i+1)%num_nodes]]-center_vector;
00733         coord_vectors[1] = vertices[vertexIndices[(i+num_nodes-1)%num_nodes]]-center_vector;
00734         ++total;
00735         inverted += (coord_vectors[2]%(coord_vectors[0]*coord_vectors[1] ) <= 0.0);
00736       }
00737       break;
00738 
00739     default: // generic code for 3D elements
00740     {
00741       size_t num_corners = corner_count();
00742       unsigned num_adj;
00743       const unsigned* adj_idx;
00744       for (unsigned j = 0; j < num_corners; ++j)
00745       {
00746         adj_idx = TopologyInfo::adjacent_vertices( mType, j, num_adj );
00747         if (3 != num_adj)
00748         {
00749           MSQ_SETERR(err)("Unsupported element type.", MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00750           return;
00751         }
00752         
00753         center_vector = vertices[vertexIndices[j]];
00754         coord_vectors[0] = vertices[vertexIndices[adj_idx[0]]] - center_vector;
00755         coord_vectors[1] = vertices[vertexIndices[adj_idx[1]]] - center_vector;
00756         coord_vectors[2] = vertices[vertexIndices[adj_idx[2]]] - center_vector;
00757         ++total;
00758         inverted += (coord_vectors[0]%(coord_vectors[1]*coord_vectors[2] ) <= 0.0);
00759       }
00760       break;
00761     }
00762   } // end switch over element type
00763 }
00764 
00765 } // namespace Mesquite
